title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Self-Directed Language Learning for Adult Learners Using Smart Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners will independently plan and execute language learning schedules for ≥3 hours per week using mobile-based adaptive learning tools.
Learners will enhance real-world communication skills by ≥20% through interactive virtual scenario-based content.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy in language tasks they compose through an AI feedback system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
